title: The Carla Simón Legacy: Almost a Decade From ‘Summer 1993,’ Catalonia Continues to Generate Striking New Talent
summary: Almost a decade on from Carla Simón’s striking “Summer 1993”, which amassed three Goya Awards, five Gaudí Awards, won best first feature at Berlin, and the Golden Biznaga in Málaga, Catalonia continues to prove itself a leading European talent export. Simón went on to win the coveted Golden Bear wi…
